column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba is always a fun place to go! If you are a sangria fan
column2: definitely give them a try.  The house white is delicious
column3: and I also love the passion fruit sangria.  Favorites: lamb kabobs
column6: and the vanilla flan! I went for a night out with my girlfriend
column7: and it was very affordable.  It ended up being around $75 before tip; this included a pitcher of sangria
column9: and dessert! Tip: check in on yelp and get a free dessert :)
